Text:
I'm a severe hemophiliac, and I also like to share.
Enjoy, anybody interested in medical history should watch this, as well as anybody else with a coagulopathy, or a friend of one. If you had a friend pass away from HIV contracted from Hemophilia medicine, this documentary will touch your heart to learn about what us Hemophiliacs were subjected to in the 60's, 70's, and 80's.
I don't know why it says 0 seeds 0 leechers, know that I am seeding this, and 9 others currently.
